about_the_game:
For $8.99, CAM is an innovative first-person shooter that combines the intensity of tactical action games with a unique and immersive perspective. Set in a modern world filled with tension and conflict, CAM puts you in the shoes of a special forces agent equipped with a body camera that captures every moment of your mission. We took inspiration from games like Unrecord and Bodycam.

In CAM, every decision matters and every bullet fired can change the course of your operation. With a realistic and detailed approach, the game offers an immersive experience that will make you feel the adrenaline of being on the battlefield.

Key Features:
Unique Perspective: Action is displayed from the viewpoint of a body camera, providing a realistic and visceral angle that fully immerses you in the gameplay experience.

Zombie Mode: Battle hordes of zombies in an exciting mode that tests your skills and teamwork abilities.

Realistic Graphics: Enjoy detailed maps and impressive visual effects that transport you directly to the heart of the action.

Tactical Gameplay: Plan your moves, use the environment to your advantage, and work together to complete your missions.

Wishlist CAM now and get ready for a first-person shooter experience like no other!

Send us proof of wishlist and sharing in IG stories for exclusive access.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X, Intel Core i7-9700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: SONY
